FuncDef: The hwtacacs-server authorization command configures the HWTACACS authorization server. The undo hwtacacs-server authorization command deletes configurations of the HWTACACS authorization server. By default, no HWTACACS authorization server is configured.
CLIs: hwtacacs-server authorization <ipv4-address> [ <port> ] [ public-net | vpn-instance <vpn-instance-name> ] [ secondary | third | fourth ] [ shared-keycipher <cipher-string> ] [ mux-mode ]
undo hwtacacs-server authorization [ <ipv4-address> [ <port> ] [ public-net | vpn-instance <vpn-instance-name> ] [ secondary | third | fourth ] [ mux-mode ] ]

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the IPv4 address of an HWTACACS authorization server.
The value is in dotted decimal notation. The value must be a valid unicast address.

Specifies the port number of the HWTACACS authorization server.
The value is an integer that ranges from 1 to 65535. The default port number is 49.

Indicates that the HWTACACS authorization server is connected to the public network.
-

Specifies the name of a VPN instance. This parameter is supported only in the HWTACACS server template view.
The value is a string of 1 to 31 case-sensitive characters.

Configures the second HWTACACS authorization server as the secondary server. If no secondary HWTACACS authorization server is configured, the primary HWTACACS authorization server is specified.
-

Configures the third HWTACACS authorization server as the secondary server. If no secondary HWTACACS authorization server is configured, the primary HWTACACS authorization server is specified.
-

Configures the fourth HWTACACS authentication server as the secondary server. If no secondary HWTACACS accounting server is configured, the primary HWTACACS accounting server is configured.
-

Specifies the shared key of the HWTACACS authorization server.
-

Specifies the shared key of the HWTACACS authorization server.
The value is a string of 1 to 255 case-sensitive characters in plaintext or a string of 128 to 428 case-sensitive characters in ciphertext. The string can contain spaces if it is enclosed in double quotation marks (").

Indicates that the HWTACACS server works in multiplex mode.
-

ExtraInfo: To authorize users in HWTACACS mode, you must configure the HWTACACS authorization server.
